text: Faversham is a market town in Swale, Kent, England. Nearly 20,000 people live in Faversham. Its postcode is ME13. ==Climate== Faversham holds the record for the highest temperature ever recorded in the UK, 39.0 °C (102.2 °F) on 19 July 2022. On 19 July 2022, Faversham recorded its highest July temperature on record, 39.0 °C (102.2 °F). The lowest temperature ever recorded in Faversham was -16.1 °C (3.0 °F) in January 1966. ==References== Category:Towns in Kent
title: Faversham
